title.rendered: INTECH works on Pakistan’s first ever tight gas project at Kadanwari

content.rendered:
INTECH Process Automation has executed a Raw Gas Fiscal Metering project for Pakistan’s first ever tight gas project for OMV at Kadanwari.

OMV sought a solutions partner who could address the complexities and technical challenges for a first of its kind project in Pakistan at Kadanwari. The foremost of these challenges included sand particles carry-over, high water content, high H2S content and wet gas handling at high pressure.

INTECH broke through intense competition for the project due to its expertise with tight gas in USA and its long history of successes with OMV. INTECH supplied a highly customized package for OMV’s specific needs and high compliance requirements. The skid was assembled in INTECH’s Panel Shop at Jabel Ali, Dubai, UAE and was backed by a specially designed knock-out drum which addressed the high sulphur and water content issues. This is the first of its kind metering skid introduced in Pakistan.

Kadanwari Gas Field is an Onshore Gas Production Facility located on the Middle Indus Basin in Khairpur district, Sindh, Pakistan.


About INTECH Metering Solutions

INTECH’s solutions designed for metering, storage and fuel systems help address the unique issues faced by oil and gas specialized applications like buoys, metering skids, tank gauging and burner management. Keeping these applications’ exclusive operational needs in mind, INTECH’s solutions help deliver reliable and robust solutions customized to the needs of each customer with strict conformance to industry and OEM standards.

Learn more about INTECH Metering solutions here: https://www.intechww.com/products-and-solutions/metering-storage-and-fuel-systems/

About INTECH

INTECH Process Automation Inc. is an international Control Systems engineering and Systems Integration company delivering reliable automation solutions to the Oil & Gas sector since 1991. INTECH has done projects in 31 countries across 6 continents with regional offices in 13 countries, equipping it with 2000+ engineering man-years of experience. INTECH’s vendor-neutral approach and extensive experience help serve both regional and global customers with the highest standards of quality and reliability.

INTECH covers all traditional asset classes (upstream, midstream & downstream) as well as shale and buoy automation. Its wide range of solutions covers traditional control system automation as well as hydraulic (surface and sub-surface) control system automation and advanced software solutions for operations and asset management. Customers benefit from INTECH’s lump-sum turnkey solutions to save costs and increase plant productivity.

For more Information, visit: www.intechww.com
